branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Ball Bushing
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless cylinder, magnetically coupled series CY*L includes an integrated ball bushing for stable travel resistance.  Magnetically coupled cylinders have a wide range of applications, and save mounting space.  Loads and moments are possible through the use of integrated guides.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Ball Bushing

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY1L, Magnetically Coupled - Ball Bushing
branchItem.description: <p>The CY1L Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  It is available in a standard or heavy duty magnetic holding force.  It is a one piece unit integrated with ball bushing bearings which allows for smooth operation and ensures stable travel resistance.</p>
